page.title: 08Clothes in East Leicester.
page.content: Muslim ladies & girls usually wear the same kind of clothes,such as a shalwar suit,Punjabi suit or noori suit. The shalwar suit is a straight dress with slits up the sides,trousers which are baggy with patterns on the bottom & a doopata,which is a long scarf. The Punjabi suit is similar but has tight trousers without any patterns on the bottom. The noori suit is also similar but is worn with a belt. When Muslim ladies,or older girls,go to the Mosque they wear a bourka which is a cape covering the head with a net sewn on to it which covers the face.Muslim men normally wear trousers & long sleeved tunics with a high collar or a round neck. On Eid day some men wear a jublo which is like a long dress.
